TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Reduces the cooldown of Ruthless Onslaught by % upon impact.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Cheap Shot
TalentTreeArray.Text: Increase Hamstring damage to disabled targets
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Hamstring does % more damage to targets affected by a Slow, Root, or Stun.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Insatiable Blade
TalentTreeArray.Text: Increases Butcher's Brand healing, adds Move Speed
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Increases Butcher's Brand's healing from % to % of Physical damage dealt. While facing the branded enemy, The Butcher's Movement Speed is increased by %.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Victuals
TalentTreeArray.Text: Nearby Minion deaths heal
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Every time a nearby enemy minion dies, The Butcher heals % of his maximum health.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Meat Shield
TalentTreeArray.Text: Ruthless Onslaught grants Spell Armor
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: When Ruthless Onslaught impacts an enemy Hero, The Butcher gains Spell Armor for seconds, reducing Ability Damage taken by %.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Fires of Hell
TalentTreeArray.Text: Furnace Blast explodes twice
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Furnace Blast explodes a second time 3 seconds after the initial explosion.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Slaughterhouse
TalentTreeArray.Text: Lamb to the Slaughter chains all enemy Heroes
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Lamb to the Slaughter now chains all enemy Heroes in range.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Cleaver
TalentTreeArray.Text: Basic Attacks deal area damage
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Basic Attacks deal % of The Butcher's Basic Attack Damage in an area around the target.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Savage Charge
TalentTreeArray.Text: Ruthless Onslaught deals extra damage
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Ruthless Onslaught deals bonus damage to Heroes equal to 10% of their maximum Health.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Brutal Strike
TalentTreeArray.Text: Hamstring empowers Basic Attacks
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: After using Hamstring, The Butcher's next Basic Attacks within seconds deal an additional % damage.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Crippling Slam
TalentTreeArray.Text: Hamstring slow no longer fades and lasts longer
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Hamstring's slow no longer fades out, and the duration is increased by 25%.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Enraged
TalentTreeArray.Text: Gain Attack Speed and Armor at low Health
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: While below 50% of his maximum Health, taking damage causes The Butcher to become Enraged for seconds, gaining % Attack Speed and Armor, reducing damage taken by %.This effect has a second cooldown.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Blood Frenzy
TalentTreeArray.Text: Basic Attacks grant Attack and Move Speed
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes grant % increased Attack and Movement Speed for seconds, up to %.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Nexus Blades

TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Basic Attacks deal % more damage and slow enemy Movement Speed by % for second.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Bolt of the Storm
TalentTreeArray.Text: Activate to teleport a short distance
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Activate to teleport to a nearby location.

Name: Chen
HeroInfo: To be a brewmaster is to be an explorer, a lover of nature, and when the need arises; a powerful fighter. For years Chen Stormstout has wandered the world of Azeroth in search of rare ingredients, stirring stories, and of course, good brew.
HeroDescription: A potent Bruiser that will dominate if the enemy team is lacking mobility.

TalentTreeArray.Text: Quest: Hit Heroes to empower Breath of Fire
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Heroes Ignited: /Bonus Damage: %

TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Fortifying Brew grants Spell Armor while drinking, reducing Ability Damage taken by %.

TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Activate to evade enemy Basic Attacks for seconds. Chen's Basic Attacks reduce this cooldown by seconds.

TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Flying Kick no longer costs Brew. Additionally, its damage is increased by 100% while Chen has Shields from Fortifying Brew.

TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Quest: Every time Keg Smash hits a Hero, increase its damage by , up to . Reward: After hitting Heroes, increase its range by 125% and gain an additional charge.

TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: After using Breath of Fire, ignite in a fiery aura, dealing damage every second to nearby enemies for seconds.

TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: While at or below 50 Brew, gain % Movement Speed. While at or above 50 Brew, regenerate an additional Health per second.

TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Fortifying Brew instantly Shields Chen for . Additionally, Shields persist for extra second after he stops drinking.

TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Increases regeneration effects and all healing received by %, or by % while drinking Fortifying Brew.

TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Wandering Keg increases Movement Speed by % and grants Armor, reducing damage taken by %.

TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Increases the spirits' Health to 100% of Chen's maximum Health and empowers their abilities.Storm can grant the spirits Unstoppable. Earth's leap cooldown is reduced by seconds. Fire grants Attack Speed as long as it is alive.

TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Each time Living Bomb deals periodic damage, Kael'thas's Basic Ability cooldowns are reduced by second.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Backdraft
TalentTreeArray.Text: Living Bomb explosion slows enemies
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Living Bomb's explosion slows enemy Movement Speed by % for seconds.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Fission Bomb
TalentTreeArray.Text: Increases Living Bomb explosion radius
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Increases Living Bomb's explosion radius by 20%.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Fury of the Sunwell
TalentTreeArray.Text: Flamestrike explodes twice
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Flamestrike will explode a second time seconds later.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Twin Spheres
TalentTreeArray.Text: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Verdant Spheres gains a second charge.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Arcane Dynamo
TalentTreeArray.Text: Using Basic Abilities increases Spell Power
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Using a Basic Ability increases Kael'thas's Spell Power by % for seconds, stacking up to %.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Rebirth
TalentTreeArray.Text: Increases Phoenix duration and may retarget
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Increases Phoenix duration by 100%. While alive, the Phoenix may be ordered to move to a different location.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Presence Of Mind
TalentTreeArray.Text: Increases Pyroblast radius and lowers cooldown
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Increases Pyroblast's explosion radius by 50% and reduces its cooldown by seconds per enemy Hero hit.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Master of Flames
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Living Bomb's spread from explosions can now also spread Living Bomb.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Flamethrower
TalentTreeArray.Text: Increases Flamestrike's range
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Increases the cast range of Flamestrike by 40%. If Flamestrike hits 2 or more Heroes, its cooldown is reduced by seconds.

Name: Leoric
HeroInfo: Madness. Betrayal. Death. These are the legacy of the Black King Leoric's reign. Driven to madness by the spirit of Diablo, Leoric brought untold suffering on his kingdom. Even after his death there was no release for the Skeleton King.
HeroDescription: A Bruiser that deals high damage against teams with many high Health Heroes.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Mana Thirst
TalentTreeArray.Text: Skeletal Swing restores Mana per enemy hit
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Skeletal Swing restores Mana per enemy hit.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Hopelessness
TalentTreeArray.Text: Increases Drain Hope range
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Increases the range of Drain Hope by 25%.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Block
TalentTreeArray.Text: Periodically gain Physical Armor
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Gain Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by %

TalentTreeArray.Name: Reanimation
TalentTreeArray.Text: Quest: Gather Regen Globes to revive faster
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Leoric can gather Regeneration Globes while Undying.Quest: Gathering a Regeneration Globe increases Leoric's Health Regeneration by per second, up to per second. Reward: After gathering Globes, Leoric always respawns 10 seconds faster.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Fealty Unto Death
TalentTreeArray.Text: Gain Health and Mana when Minions die
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: When a nearby Minion dies, Leoric restores 1% of his maximum Health and Mana. Half as effective while Undying.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Willing Vessel
TalentTreeArray.Text: Increases Drain Hope healing
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Increases the healing from Drain Hope to 30% of your maximum Health and Drain Essence to 15% of your maximum Health.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Hardened Bones
TalentTreeArray.Text: Gain Armor during Wraith Walk
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: During Wraith Walk, gain Armor, taking % less damage.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Royal Focus
TalentTreeArray.Text: Reduce Wraith Walk cooldown. Empowers Skeletal Swing
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: If Leoric's body takes no damage during Wraith Walk's duration, the cooldown is reduced to seconds. Wraith Walk also increases the damage of the next Skeletal Swing within seconds by 50%.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Ghastly Reach
TalentTreeArray.Text: Longer Skeletal Swing range
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Increases the range of Skeletal Swing by 25%.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Lingering Apparition
TalentTreeArray.Text: Wraith Walk lasts longer
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Increases the duration of Wraith Walk by 80%.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Paralyzing Rage
TalentTreeArray.Text: Increased Skeletal Swing slow
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Increases the Movement Speed slow of Skeletal Swing to 60%.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Ossein Renewal
TalentTreeArray.Text: Activate to heal, while alive or Undying
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Activate to heal 20% of Leoric's maximum life over seconds. Half as effective while Undying.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Entomb (Cancel)
TalentTreeArray.Text: Wall in an area
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Press to destroy Entomb early.

TalentTreeArray.Name: March of the Black King
TalentTreeArray.Text: March forward, healing Leoric, damaging enemies
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Leoric becomes Unstoppable and swings his mace three times, healing himself for % of his maximum Health for each enemy Hero hit and dealing damage.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Burning Rage
TalentTreeArray.Text: Deals damage to nearby enemies
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Deal damage per second to nearby enemies.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Crushing Hope
TalentTreeArray.Text: Drain Hope does bonus damage if it finishes
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: If Drain Hope lasts its full duration, it deals bonus damage equal to % of the victim's Maximum Health. This damage does not heal Leoric.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Drain Momentum
TalentTreeArray.Text: Drain Hope now grants Movement Speed
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Drain Hope now increases Leoric's Movement Speed by 10% instead of reducing it.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Spell Shield
TalentTreeArray.Text: Periodically gain temporary Spell Armor
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Every seconds, gain Spell Armor against the next enemy Ability and subsequent Abilities for seconds, reducing the damage taken by %.Can be toggled to allow or prevent this talent from triggering automatically.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Renewed Swing
TalentTreeArray.Text: Can cast Skeletal Swing again
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Skeletal Swing can be recast again for free within seconds for 50% damage.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Consume Vitality
TalentTreeArray.Text: Skeletal Swing heals
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Ghastly Swing heals Leoric for 1% of his maximum Health per target hit, up to 5%. Twice as effective while Living.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Unyielding Despair
TalentTreeArray.Text: Drain Hope cooldown is reduced
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Every second Drain Hope is active, its cooldown is reduced by 1 second.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Imposing Presence
TalentTreeArray.Text: Activate to slow enemy Basic Attacks and Move Speed
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Activate to slow the Attack Speed by % and Movement Speed by % of nearby Heroes and Summons for seconds.Passive: Heroes and Summons that attack your Hero have their Attack Speed slowed by % for seconds.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Buried Alive
TalentTreeArray.Text: Entomb damages enemies
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Enemies inside Entomb take damage per second.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Death March
TalentTreeArray.Text: March of the Black King applies Drain Hope
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: The final swing of March of the Black King also applies an untalented Drain Hope to all enemy Heroes in a large area.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Spectral Leech
TalentTreeArray.Text: Basic Attacks deal extra damage and heal
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes deal bonus damage equal to % of the Hero's maximum Health and heal Leoric for the same amount.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Hardened Shield
TalentTreeArray.Text: Activate to gain massive Armor
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Activate to gain Armor for seconds, taking % less damage.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Olaf the Stout
TalentTreeArray.Text: Olaf gains Physical Armor
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Every seconds, Olaf gains Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by %.Stores up to charges.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Spy Games
TalentTreeArray.Text: Erik gains Stealth and increases vision if stationary
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: After standing still for 3 seconds, Erik gains Stealth and his Sight Radius is increased by 75%. The Stealth persists for seconds after moving.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Explosive Attacks
TalentTreeArray.Text: Increases Baleog splash to non-Heroic enemies
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Increases Baleog's splash damage against non-Heroes to 100%.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Viking Bribery
TalentTreeArray.Text: Kill Minions to bribe a Mercenary
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Bribe Stacks:

TalentTreeArray.Name: Pain Don't Hurt
TalentTreeArray.Text: Baleog's attacks heal himself
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Baleog's Basic Attacks and splash damage heal for % of the damage dealt. Healing is doubled against Heroes.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Erik the Swift
TalentTreeArray.Text: Increases Erik's Move Speed and heal while running
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Permanently increases Erik's base Movement Speed by 10%, and as long as Erik is moving he heals Health per second.

TalentTreeArray.Name: It's a Sabotage!
TalentTreeArray.Text: Erik's attacks stronger against Structures
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Erik's Basic Attacks against Structures light them on fire for 10 seconds, causing damage and destroying Ammo.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Mercenary Lord
TalentTreeArray.Text: Empower nearby Mercenaries
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Friendly non-Boss Mercenaries near your Hero deal % more damage. Gain Armor against Minions and Mercenaries, reducing the damage taken by %.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Baleog the Fierce
TalentTreeArray.Text: Baleog's attacks increase his Attack Speed
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Baleog's Basic Attacks increase his Attack Speed by %, stacking up to times. After seconds of not attacking, these stacks will rapidly decay.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Spin To Win!
TalentTreeArray.Text: Deals damage around each Viking
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Activate to have each Viking deal damage to nearby enemies.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Norse Force!
TalentTreeArray.Text: All Vikings gain a Shield
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: All Vikings gain a to point Shield, increasing in strength for each Viking alive. Lasts seconds.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Longboat Raid!
TalentTreeArray.Text: Load into a Longboat to attack enemies
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Hop into an Unstoppable Longboat that fires at nearby enemies for damage per second and can fire a mortar that deals damage in an area. The boat has increased Health for each Viking inside. If the boat is destroyed by enemies, all Vikings are stunned for seconds. Lasts seconds.Requires all surviving Vikings to be nearby.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Play Again!
TalentTreeArray.Text: Revive and summon Vikings
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Summon, fully heal, and revive all Lost Vikings at target location after a Viking channels for 2 seconds. Only one Viking may attempt to summon at a time.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Hunka' Burning Olaf
TalentTreeArray.Text: Olaf deals damage to nearby enemies
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Olaf deals damage every second to nearby enemies.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Jump!
TalentTreeArray.Text: Grants temporary Invulnerability
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Makes all Vikings Invulnerable and able to pass over enemies for seconds.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Nordic Attack Squad
TalentTreeArray.Text: Increases Viking Basic Attacks to Heroes
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Activate to have all Viking Basic Attacks deal bonus damage equal to 1% of a Hero's maximum Health for seconds.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Large and In Charge
TalentTreeArray.Text: Charge stuns enemies
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: When Olaf charges enemies, they are stunned for second.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Impatience Is a Virtue
TalentTreeArray.Text: Vikings' attacks reduce cooldowns of all Vikings
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Enemies damaged by a Viking's Basic Attack reduce the cooldown of all Viking Abilities by seconds.

TalentTreeArray.Name: 64 KB Marathon
TalentTreeArray.Text: Run faster and break slows and roots
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Gain an additional 40% Movement Speed when activating Go Go Go! that decays over 4 seconds. Additionally, the Vikings will break out of Roots and Slows.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Executioner
TalentTreeArray.Text: Attacking disabled Heroes increases damage
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Attacking a Hero that is slowed, rooted, or stunned increases your Basic Attack damage by % for seconds.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Ragnarok 'n' Roll!
TalentTreeArray.Text: Increased combat prowess
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: The Longboat can attack two targets at once and the range of its Mortar is increased by 100%.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Checkpoint Reached
TalentTreeArray.Text: Additional revive and heal
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: 10 seconds after using Play Again!, any dead Vikings are revived and summoned again, and all are healed to full.

TalentTreeArray.Name: The Sequel!
TalentTreeArray.Text: Reduces death timer for all Vikings
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Reduces the Lost Vikings' death timer by 50%.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Fury of the Storm
TalentTreeArray.Text: Basic Attacks chain to non-Heroes
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Every seconds, the next Basic Attack will deal an additional damage to the target, and damage to all nearby Minions, Mercenaries and Monsters. Each Viking has their own cooldown.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Prolonged Safeguard
TalentTreeArray.Text: Increases Safeguard duration
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Increases Safeguard's duration by second.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Trauma Trigger
TalentTreeArray.Text: Safeguard automatically activates at low Health
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Gain an untalented Safeguard automatically if damage is taken while below 50% Health. This effect has a second cooldown.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Feedback Loop
TalentTreeArray.Text: Safeguard returns Mana on expiration
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: When Safeguard expires, Mana is refunded.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Scouting Drone
TalentTreeArray.Text: Reveals a large area, can be killed
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Places a Scouting Drone at target location, granting vision and revealing a large area around it for seconds. This drone cannot be hidden and is killed by enemies with Basic Attacks.Stores up to charges.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Bioshield
TalentTreeArray.Text: Grants Shield at full Health
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: If Healing Beam's target is at full Health, they gain a Shield that absorbs damage, stacking up to times.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Automated Block
TalentTreeArray.Text: Periodically gain Physical Armor
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Every seconds, gain Physical Armor against the next enemy Hero Basic Attack, reducing the damage taken by %.Stores up to charges.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Infused Grenade
TalentTreeArray.Text: Displacement Grenade refunds Mana on Hero impact
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Displacement Grenade's Mana cost is refunded if it hits an enemy Hero.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Clear!
TalentTreeArray.Text: Increased area, bigger knockback
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Displacement Grenade's explosion radius increased by 33% and knocks back farther.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Irradiate
TalentTreeArray.Text: Healing Beam grants damage aura
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Enemies near Healing Beam's target take damage a second.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Calldown: MULE
TalentTreeArray.Text: Activate to heal and rearm Structures
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Activate to calldown a Mule that repairs Structures, one at a time, near target point for seconds, healing for Health every second. Grants ammo every seconds.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Cleanse
TalentTreeArray.Text: Makes target ally Unstoppable
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Activate to make target ally Unstoppable for 1 second. Cannot be cast on yourself.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Stim Drone
TalentTreeArray.Text: Grant massive Attack and Movement Speed
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Grant an allied Hero % Attack Speed and % Movement Speed for seconds.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Depart
TalentTreeArray.Text: Transport allies across long distances
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Departs for the targeted location immediately.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Intensive Care
TalentTreeArray.Text: Healing Beam's healing increases over time
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: When Healing Beam is on a single target for over 3 seconds, its healing amount increases by 25% and Mana cost increases by .

TalentTreeArray.Name: Couples Therapy
TalentTreeArray.Text: Healing Beam also heals Lt. Morales
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: While channeling Healing Beam, Lt. Morales is healed for 25% of the healing amount at the cost of an additional Mana per second.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Preventative Care
TalentTreeArray.Text: Healing Beam target reduces enemy Attack Speed
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Basic Attacks against the Healing Beam target reduce the attacker's Attack Speed by % for seconds.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Spell Shield

TalentTreeArray.Name: Shield Sequencer
TalentTreeArray.Text: Safeguard can be cast twice
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: After casting Safeguard, it can be cast a second time within seconds at no cost.

TalentTreeArray.Name: System Shock
TalentTreeArray.Text: Displacement Grenade slows on impact
TalentTreeArray.ToolTip: Displacement Grenade slows enemies by 50% for seconds. The slow amount decays over its duration.

TalentTreeArray.Name: Second Opinion
TalentTreeArray.Text: Reduces Displacement Grenade cooldown, gains second charge
